Studentized residual vs leverage plot data

Source: R/ols-plots-data.R
ols_prep_rstudlev_data.Rd

Generates data for studentized resiudual vs leverage plot.

ols_prep_rstudlev_data(model)

Arguments

model

An object of class lm.

Examples

model <- lm(read ~ write + math + science, data = hsb)
ols_prep_rstudlev_data(model)
#> $levrstud
#> # A tibble: 200 x 5
#>      obs leverage rstudent color    fct_color
#>    <int>    <dbl>    <dbl> <chr>    <ord>    
#>  1     1  0.0167   1.56    normal   normal   
#>  2     2  0.0160   1.57    normal   normal   
#>  3     3  0.0560  -0.862   leverage leverage 
#>  4     4  0.0133   2.13    outlier  outlier  
#>  5     5  0.00723 -1.01    normal   normal   
#>  6     6  0.0190  -1.55    normal   normal   
#>  7     7  0.0282  -0.00331 normal   normal   
#>  8     8  0.0135  -1.43    normal   normal   
#>  9     9  0.00779  1.07    normal   normal   
#> 10    10  0.00611  0.720   normal   normal   
#> # ... with 190 more rows
#> 
#> $lev_thrsh
#> [1] 0.04
#> 
#> $minx
#> [1] 0.005119677
#> 
#> $miny
#> [1] -5.715729

#> [1] 0.07998748
